name: Off-Road: Redneck Racing
description:
Yeehah! Stop yer grinnin' and drop yer linen, cause the slam bangin'est, mud-flappin'est off-road driving game ever created is comin' to Steam! Motor trucks 'n Buggies over the most brutal Southland terrain ever seen in a racing game.

Whether you're just a good ol'boy out for a Sunday drive or want to compete head-to-head against those other Rednecks in Championship mode, you've never seen anything that compares to Off-Road Redneck Racing!

Features

  • Rip it up on six different terrains from the Everlastin' Everglades the Crushin' Colorado Highlands.
  • 16 different vehicle types including jeeps, pick-up trucks, Off-road-beetles and Dune Buggies.
  • Amazin' Appalachee soundtrack!
  • Upgrade your vehicles for better acceleration & handling.
  • Neither rain nor snow nor the Sheriff himself can stop these mud-machines!
    Drive through dozens of different weather and day and night environments!
  • LAN Network play allows you to race against 4-6 other players in frantic multi-player action!
